thread.title: Report Claims Tillerson Limited Korean Schedule Due To ‘Fatigue’
thread.title_full: Report Claims Tillerson Limited Korean Schedule Due To ‘Fatigue’

author: Jack Davis
title: Report Claims Tillerson Limited Korean Schedule Due To ‘Fatigue’
text:
Tapper Blasts Tillerson For Ditching The Press On Asia Trip [Video] 
The Korean Herald report noted that “Tillerson’s shortened diplomatic consultations and public events in Seoul spawned a flurry of speculation given a leadership vacuum and political uncertainties.” 
The report also noted that Tillerson spent about twice as much time with Japanese officials as he did with their Korean counterparts. 
Tillerson was scheduled to go to China as the next stop on a trip that began with a visit to Japan. Advertisement - story continues below 
On Friday, Tillerson had visited the Demilitarized Zone between North Korean and South Korea, and held a press conference during which he said that military options against North Korea would not be taken off the table if North Korea continues to advance a hostile agenda. 
Tillerson’s trip coincided with a tweet from President Donald Trump denouncing North Korea. North Korea is behaving very badly. They have been "playing" the United States for years. China has done little to help! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) March 17, 2017 
Tillerson said Friday that China needs to fully implement U.N. sanctions on North Korea to bring the nation to heel. Advertisement - story continues below
